summary: In a flooded future London, Detective Harley Stone hunts a serial killer who murdered his partner, and has haunted him ever since. He soon discovers what he is hunting might not be human.
cast: Rutger Hauer|Kim Cattrall|Alastair Duncan|Michael J. Pollard|Alun Armstrong|Pete Postlethwaite|Ian Dury|Roberta Eaton|Tony Steedman|Steven Hartley|Sara Stockbridge|Colin Skeaping|Ken Bones|Dave Duffy|Stewart Harvey-Wilson|Paul Grayson|Chris Chappell|Charlotte Hick|Morris Paton|Tina Smith|John Bennett|Martin Ronan|Phil Smeeton|Tony Sibbald|Jason Watkins|Tina Shaw|Rob Edmunds|Papillon Soo|Rikki Howard|Alan Stocks|Paul Casey|Susan Aderin|Sheila Hyde|Shend|Cathy Walker|Angie Hill|Jane van Hool|Vanessa Victor|Jadene Doran|Havoc|Lorraine Pascale Woodward|Lisa Roudette|Bibi Bohorquez|Dolores Hern√°ndez|Atilla|Debra Rodman|Liz Lisfield|Maia Jopling|Mayumi Cabrera|Bill Baker|Gordon Winter|Marc Quinn|Padraig O'Loinsigh|Daniella Rich|Tasty Tim|Whiskers|Murray Forrest|Steven Horsley
title: Segundo sangriento
